name: Milk Quest: 1+2
description:
View the beginning of the Milk Gang's story like never before!

Milk Quest 1+2 features complete reworkings of Milk Quest and Milk Quest 2,  which were originally school projects (thus why they suck). Experience the games again, or play them for the first time in the new enhanced engine!

New Features:

  • Complete port of both Milk Quest 1 and 2
  • Upscaled Graphics in Milk Quest 1
  • All games now in a HUGE 540x540 resolution
  • Brand new Conehead levels in Milk Quest 2
  • Sound Select

Credits:

  • Programming, Art by Steve the Bartender
  • Title Screen Music, Planning by Caramel
  • Milk Quest 2 Music by Varadox
